titles: The reuenge of Bussy D'Ambois A tragedie. As it hath beene often presented at the priuate play-house in the White-Fryers. VVritten by George Chapman, Gentleman.
author: Chapman, George, 1559?-1634.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] S[nodham] and are to be solde by Iohn Helme, at his shop in S. Dunstones Church-yard, in Fleetstreet,
notes: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A".

keywords: Bussy d'Amboise, 1549?-1579 --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
